questions.item1: A circle is inscribed in a square with a side length of 10. What is the area of the circle?
questions.item2: If 2^x * 2^(x+1) = 128, what is the value of x?
questions.item3: The function g(x) = 3x^2 - 12x + k has one real solution. What is the value of k?
questions.item4: If log_2(x) + log_2(8) = 5, what is the value of x?
questions.item5: The sum of the solutions to the equation x^2 - 5x + 6 = 0 is equal to:
questions.item6: A triangle has side lengths of 7, 24, and x. What is the maximum integer value of x?
questions.item7: If f(x) = 2x^3 - 3x^2 + x - 5, what is f(-2)?
questions.item9: What is the equation of the line that passes through (3, -4) and is perpendicular to the line y = 2x + 1?
questions.item10: A parabola has a vertex at (1, 2) and passes through the point (3, 10). What is its equation?
questions.item11: If sin(θ) = 5/13 and θ is in the second quadrant, what is cos(θ)?
questions.item13: What is the sum of the infinite geometric series with a first term of 8 and a common ratio of 1/4?
questions.item14: The circle x^2 + y^2 - 6x + 8y + 9 = 0 has a radius of:
questions.item15: If f(x) = 1/(x-2) and g(x) = x + 3, what is (f ∘ g)(x)?
questions.item16: If the function h(x) = ax^2 + bx + c has a maximum value at x = -3, what is the value of b/a?
questions.item18: The graph of y = |2x - 3| intersects the line y = 5 at which x-values?
questions.item19: The function p(x) = x^4 - 4x^2 + 3 is factored completely as:
questions.item20: A circle has a center at (4, -2) and passes through the origin. What is the equation of the circle?
questions.item21: If x + y = 10 and x^2 + y^2 = 58, what is the product of x and y?
questions.item22: A line passes through the points (1, 2) and (4, 8). What is its equation?
questions.item23: If a polynomial P(x) is divided by (x - 3), the remainder is 7. What is P(3)?
questions.item24: If cos(2θ) = 1/2 and 0 ≤ θ ≤ π/2, what is sin(θ)?
questions.item25: What is the solution set for x if x^2 + 4x + 4 ≤ 0?
questions.item26: The function f(x) = ax + b passes through the points (2, 3) and (5, 7). What is the value of b?
questions.item27: The inequality |3x - 7| < 5 can be written as:
questions.item28: What is the derivative of f(x) = 2x^3 - 5x^2 + x - 4 at x = 1?
questions.item29: If 3x - 4y = 7 and x + 2y = 5, what is the value of x + y?
questions.item30: The quadratic equation 4x^2 - 12x + k = 0 has a discriminant of 0. What is k?
questions.item31: If a geometric sequence has a first term of 5 and a fifth term of 625, what is the common ratio?
questions.item33: The function f(x) = |x - 3| + |x + 2| has a minimum value at x = ?
questions.item34: A cone has a height of 9 and a base radius of 6. What is its volume?
questions.item35: The area of a sector of a circle with a radius of 10 and a central angle of π/3 radians is:
questions.item36: What is the solution to the system of equations: x + y = 6 and x^2 + y^2 = 40?
questions.item38: If a and b are roots of the equation x^2 - 5x + 6 = 0, what is the value of a^2 + b^2?
questions.item39: The circle x^2 + y^2 = 25 is tangent to the line y = mx + 5 at exactly one point. What is the value of m?
questions.item40: What is the largest integer k such that 5^k divides 100!?
